original_title: Vindens vesen eller hvordan forsvare seg selv mot blendende soler
overview: Inga does not dwell on the past and she does not dread the future. It makes no difference to her whether she is free or trapped, alive or dead. The only things that matter - that drive all of her actions - are sensory impressions.
title: Character of the Wind or how to defend against dazzling suns
